Document.Name: Root element for tender clarification request

Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. It enables the buyer to process the document in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: The tender clarification request identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the tender clarification request as issued by the contracting body. Must be expressed as a UUID

Element.Name: The tender clarification request issue date
Element.Description: The date on which the tender clarification request is issued.

Element.Name: The tender clarification request issue time
Element.Description: The time when the tender clarification request is issued. The issue time must have granularity of seconds, and include time zone information.

Element.Name: The tender clarification request
Element.Description: The tender clarification request that is send to the economic operator.

Element.Name: The contracting body
Element.Description: Party information of the contracting body

Element.Name: Contracting body electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the contracting body.

Element.Name: Contracting body identifier
Element.Description: The national identifier of a contracting body as it is legally registered (e.g. VAT identification, such as KBO)

Element.Name: Contracting body name
Element.Description: The name of the contracting body as it is registered.

Element.Name: The economic operator
Element.Description: Party information of the economic operator

Element.Name: The economic operator electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the economic operator.

Element.Name: Economic operator identifier
Element.Description: An identifier that identifies the economic operator, such as a legal registration identifier. Can be the registration number in the professional registry.

Element.Name: Economic operator name
Element.Description: The name of the economic operator.

Element.Name: Additional document reference
Element.Description: Additional document reference are used for different document references, required document, provided document. To reference several types, the additional document should be repeated for each type.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: An identifier that is specified by the buyer and used as a reference number for all documents in the procurement process. It is also known as procurement project identifier, procurement reference number or contract folder identifier.
